page.title: 07 @@@@@ FARMING @@@@@
page.content: The survey showed that most of the {farmland}in{Prestatyn}is{grazing {land. There are two types of grazing land, {rough}grass which grows on the hillside and the Morfas and{improved grassland. This land has been ploughed up,fertilised and sown with grasses especially suited to feeding livestock. This land is grazed by cattle,either dairy cattle to produce milk or beef cattle to produce meat. Sheep are grazed on the rough uplands. The farmers save some fields of {improved} grass to cut and make { {silage}from.{Silage}is stored in a big {silo} until the{winter}then it is taken out for the animals to eat when the grasses in the pastures is not growing. The only{cereal}crop was{barley, {again grown to feed stock.
